SA15n1270:1: vādī prāha | yadi kaścidvadedasti sattvo yāvatsanti prāṇā asti jīva ityādi |
SA15n1270:7: yathārhattvaphalaṃ kasmiṃścideva kāle vidyamānamapi pūrvaṃ paścāccāvidyamānatvādabhāva iti jñāyate |
SA15n1270:8: yathā ca dvītīyo mūrdhā tṛtīyo hastaśca |
SA15n1270:21: yabhdavatoktaṃ [yathā] dvitīyasya mūrdhnastṛtīyasya hastasya cādṛśyatvāda-[bhāvaḥ] arhattva-[phalasyāpya]bhāvaḥ iti spaṣṭam |
SA15n1270:23: dvitīyasya mūrdhno nāstitve'pi tarhi na prathamasya nāstitvam |
SA15n1270:29: yadyapi binduparimāṇaṃ na jñāyate tathāpyastyeva sāgaraḥ |
SA15n1270:33: yadi na śakyate vaktaṃ tadā bhavata evārthahāniḥ |
SA15n1270:37: yathā rātrau taruṃ dṛṣṭvā citte saṃśayaḥ |
SA15n1270:39: na khalū taruḥ sthāṇoḥ puruṣasya vo[palabdhau] niyato hetuḥ |
SA15n1270:40: anupalabdhireva nirvāṇasyābhāve niyato heturiti cennātra saṃśayasambhavaḥ |
SA15n1270:51: kiñca yadi vipākasya vināśaheturvartata iti cennocyate |
SA15n1270:57: yadi sāgarodakasabhdāvānnirvāṇasabhdāvaḥ siddhastadā kiṃ dvitīyasyāpi mūrdhnaḥ sabhdāvo na sidhyati |
SA15n1270:58: dvitīyasyāpi mūrdhnaḥ sabhdāvo na siddha iti cet kathaṃ nirvāṇasya sabhdāvaḥ |
SA15n1270:59: tasmābhdavatoktaḥ sāgarodakadṛṣṭāntaḥ nirvāṇasabhdāvaṃ sādhayituṃ na samarthaḥ |
SA15n1270:66: yadyasato nirvāṇasya sattā tadā svato'sato'sattvamapi saditi cet,
SA15n1270:78: yadyakṛtakatvānnitya evātmeti tadā nityo'nitya veti saṃśayasyāsambhavaḥ |
SA15n1270:80: vādī | iyaṃ doṣāpattirna mamaivāpi tu sarveṣāmeva vādināṃ yathā śabdo nityo 'mūrtatvāt |
SA15n1270:85: bhavatāṃ tūdāhṛto dṛṣṭānto mama saṃśayamutpādayati tasmādasiyo'yaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ |
SA15n1270:88: yatpunarbhavatoktaṃ sarveṣāmeva doṣāpattirna tu mamaivetyeṣa svadoṣa eva na tu paradoṣaḥ |
SA15n1270:90: yathā kaścidabhiyukta ātmānamaprakāśya sarva eva taskarā iti vadettadāsau puruṣa ātmānamapi taskaraṃ manyata iti jñeyam |
SA15n1270:92: idānīṃ yadi bhavānātmānaṃ prakāśayitumiḥcchu pūrvayuktimatikramya punarvaktumicchennūnaṃ bahudoṣāpattiḥ syāt |
SA15n1270:95: pañcamena doṣāvadhimicchan pūrvaṃ nātikrāmedataḥ bhavato'ntyaḥ pakṣaḥ punaruktaṃ bhavet |
SA15n1270:105: ato'yaṃ svayame sadoṣaḥ kathaṃ taṃ dūṣayet |
